name: FocusPulse Agent
description: A simple Telex.im agent that helps users stay productive by managing focus sessions, breaks, and daily productivity summaries.
author: McGibson Izuchukwu

actions.name: Start Focus Session
actions.description: Starts a focus session for the user.

actions.name: Stop Focus Session
actions.description: Stops a running focus session for the user.

actions.name: Get Status
actions.description: Fetch all focus sessions for a given user.

actions.name: Enable Daily Summary
actions.description: Schedules a daily productivity summary for the user.

scheduling.description: Agent checks every 30 minutes for completed focus sessions and sends daily summaries at scheduled times.
